body:
The lmod package contains these lines:

```
        # Add our lua to PATH
        os.environ['PATH'] = spec['lua'].prefix.bin + ';' + os.environ['PATH']
```

This does not work; it should use a colon `:` instead of a semicolon `;`. (Alternatively, the lua package should do this already.)
title: lmod package uses `;` instead of `:` as PATH separator
